Title: Fresh Rhubarb Pie
Author: The name of the author goes here
Steps: Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Step 2: Combine sugar and flour. Sprinkle 1/4 of it over the pastry in pie plate. Heap rhubarb over this mixture. Sprinkle with remaining sugar and flour. Dot with small pieces of butter. Cover with top crust.
Step 3: Place pie on lowest rack in oven. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking for 40 to 45 minutes. Serve warm or cold.
